animeDescription: "Unwritten" - An episode about Futaba and Kou in middle school. Based on the chapter called "Unwritten." also known as chapter 0 or Prologue.  "Page.13" - An episode that continues the story after the television series's 12th and final episode.  (Source: sakisaka10)
